Package ohos.agp.render

Class PathEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.PathEffect

  • public class PathEffect
extends Object
    Represents the path effects for drawing geometric graphics.

    This class provides constructors for creating multiple path effects, including dashed-line, discrete, rounded-corner, and composed path effects.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  PathEffect.Style
      Enumerates the permutation styles of each shape in the path effect.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PathEffect

        public PathEffect​(float[] intervals,
                  float phase)
        A constructor used to create a dashed-line effect with the specified intervals and phase.

        Values saved in intervals are in pairs: The even and odd indices of these values specify the number of pixels to draw and the number of blank pixels, respectively. For example, if a line segment starts at (100, 100) and ends at (400, 100), and if intervals is set to {5.0f, 10.0f, 15.0f, 10.0f, 25.0f, 20.0f} and phase is set to 10.0f, then the Canvas#drawLine(Point, Point, Paint) method draws five blank pixels and a 15-pixel solid line segment until all values in the value array intervals are used for drawing in the same manner.

        Parameters:
        intervals - Indicates the array of pixels to draw and blank pixels, which are jointly used to create the dashed-line effect.
        phase - Indicates the offset from where the pixel starts in intervals.
        Since:
        3

      • PathEffect

        public PathEffect​(float cornerRadius)
        A constructor used to create a CornerPathEffect instance.

        In this path effect, rounded corners are used to connect line segments of the path in a smoother manner.

        Parameters:
        cornerRadius - Indicates the radius of the rounded corners on the path.
        Since:
        3

      • PathEffect

        public PathEffect​(Path shape,
                  float advance,
                  float phase,
                  PathEffect.Style style)
        A constructor used to create a Path1DPathEffect instance.

        The Path1DPathEffect object is similar to DashPathEffect except that Path1DPathEffect has the dash-line effect produced by a specified shape, such as a circle, rectangle, and triangle. Note that this effect takes effect only when the style of Paint is STROKE or STROKE_AND_FILL, regardless of the line width of this Paint.

        Parameters:
        shape - Indicates the shape on the path.
        advance - Indicates the distance between two adjacent shapes.
        phase - Indicates the offset, which is similar to that in DashPathEffect. You can change the value of this parameter to produce an animation effect.
        style - Indicates the permutation style of each shape, especially distinct at the corner. For details, see Style.
        Since:
        3

      • PathEffect

        public PathEffect​(float segLength,
                  float deviation)
        A constructor used to create a DiscretePathEffect instance.

        This constructor produces discrete effect on the original path, for example, for rusty iron wires. The shorter the line segment, the greater the line deviation, and the more obvious the "burr" effect.

        Parameters:
        segLength - Indicates the length of the line segment.
        deviation - Indicates the deviation from the original position of the line segment.
        Since:
        3

      • PathEffect

        public PathEffect​(PathEffect outerPathEffect,
                  PathEffect innerPathEffect)
        A constructor used to create a ComposePathEffect instance.

        This constructor combines two path effects to form a composed path effect. Specifically, the innerPathEffect is added and then the outerPathEffect is appended to innerPathEffect.

        Parameters:
        outerPathEffect - Indicates the path effect to append to the end of innerPathEffect.
        innerPathEffect - Indicates the initial path effect to add for the path.
        Since:
        3
